INFORM DETROIT

RESOURCES

  • Check out CitizenDetroit's main website to see our leadership, keep up with events, subscribe to our email list, and view reports from past events.

    Citizen Detroit

  • CitizenDetroit's youtube page has videos of all the candidates, as well as videos about our events.

    Youtube Channel

  • The State's official voter information site lets you check your registration status, what address you are registered at, and how to register to vote.

    Michigan Vote

  • The Detroit Environmental Agenda is a local coalition of environmental justice and sustainability advocates. They have also published a candidate questionnaire for this year's election.

    Detroit Environmental
